an5.77:1.1: “Pancimani, bhikkhave, anagatabhayani sampassamanena alameva arannikena bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.77:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, aranniko bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an5.77:2.4: Ekakam kho pana mam aranne viharantam
an5.77:2.5: ahi va mam damseyya, vicchiko va mam damseyya, satapadi va mam damseyya,
an5.77:2.6: tena me assa kalankiriya, so mamassa antarayo;
an5.77:2.7: handaham viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya’ti.
an5.77:2.8: Idam, bhikkhave, pathamam anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva arannikena bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.77:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, aranniko bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an5.77:3.4: upakkhalitva va papateyyam, bhattam va bhuttam me byapajjeyya, pittam va me kuppeyya, semham va me kuppeyya, satthaka va me vata kuppeyyum,
an5.77:3.5: tena me assa kalankiriya, so mamassa antarayo;
an5.77:3.6: handaham viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya’ti.
an5.77:3.7: Idam, bhikkhave, dutiyam anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva arannikena bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.77:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, aranniko bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an5.77:4.4: valehi samagaccheyyam, sihena va byagghena va dipina va acchena va taracchena va, te mam jivita voropeyyum,
an5.77:4.5: tena me assa kalankiriya, so mamassa antarayo;
an5.77:4.6: handaham viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya’ti.
an5.77:4.7: Idam, bhikkhave, tatiyam anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva arannikena bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.77:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, aranniko bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an5.77:5.4: manavehi samagaccheyyam katakammehi va akatakammehi va, te mam jivita voropeyyum,
an5.77:5.5: tena me assa kalankiriya, so mamassa antarayo;
an5.77:5.6: handaham viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya’ti.
an5.77:5.7: Idam, bhikkhave, catuttham anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva arannikena bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.77:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, aranniko bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an5.77:6.3: Santi kho panaranne vala amanussa, te mam jivita voropeyyum,
an5.77:6.4: tena me assa kalankiriya, so mamassa antarayo;
an5.77:6.5: handaham viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya’ti.
an5.77:6.6: Idam, bhikkhave, pancamam anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva arannikena bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.77:7.1: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca anagatabhayani sampassamanena alameva arannikena bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
